name: Dimension Dodger
description:
Dimension Dodger is a one-button bullet-dodging game starring a spaceship. 'Nuff said.

The objective is simple: dodge as many bullets as you can and see how long you can survive. If a bullet is the same color as your spaceship when it collides with the ship, you survive. If, however, the bullet is a different color, you die.

Use the Space bar to control the action. It does everything - starts the game, changes the color of the spaceship, resets the game.

Made for the Boundless Game Jam. Theme was "one button".
